1 Requirements for running Advanced AcquisitionApplets

Software / Runtime version requirement

SiliconSoftware Runtime version 5.2.2 or newer installed at the target PC system

Licensing:

There is no additional license required.


2 Version 1.0

Advanced AquisitionApplets Version 1.0 is the initial version.

It includes two new advanced acquisition applets for microEnable IV AQ4-GE/GPoE and microEnable IV VQ4-GE/GPoE, supporting link aggregation (LAG) with GigE Vision:

  • Acq_DualGEx2AreaBayer8
  • Acq_DualGEx2AreaGray12

These applets replace their earlier pre-release versions.

The GigE Vision standard 2.0 introduced, apart from other improvements, Link Aggregation (LAG). LAG enables double transfer bandwidth. At present, Silicon Software supports a specific implementation for the packet distribution over two physical links. Please contact the Silicon Software Sales or Silicon Software Support departments to get to know which cameras are compatible.
